59f3b0138bf5501e050f3562.name: Bear Stance
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3562.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3562.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for {{ e3 }} second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3563.name: Phoenix Stance
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3563.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - With the first basic attack and every third attack after, Udyr engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3563.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Burns enemies in front of Udyr on his first basic attack and every third attack after, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b0228bf5501e050f35b7.name: Despair
59f3b0228bf5501e050f35b7.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second.
59f3b0228bf5501e050f35b7.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*2 }})% of their maximum health each second.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f3580.name: Dredge Line
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3580.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor and the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3580.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward and the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3594.name: Twilight Assault
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3594.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3594.tooltip:
Shen recalls his spirit blade and draws it. Enemies it collides with are slowed by {{ e4 }}% when moving away from Shen for the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Shen's next {{ e3 }} attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*.01 }})% of their target's max health as bonus magic damage. If the spirit blade collided with an enemy champion, those attacks deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*.01 }})% instead and have +{{ e9 }}% Attack Speed.

Each attack deals {{ e6 }} extra magic damage to monsters and minions (max {{ e7 }}).

59f3b0148bf5501e050f3583.name: Depth Charge
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3583.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3583.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3593.name: Overload
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3593.description:
Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains a shield and Movement Speed.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3593.tooltip:
Passive: Rune Prison and Spell Flux reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Rune for {{ e2 }} seconds, up to {{ e9 }} Runes.

Active: Unleash a runic blast, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy struck. Any active Runes are discharged.

If {{ e9 }} Runes are discharged, they Overload, shielding Ryze from {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage and increasing his Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3568.name: Ice Shard
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3568.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3568.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

59f3b0218bf5501e050f35b6.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
59f3b0218bf5501e050f35b6.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage and fills a portion of his Blood Well every third subsequent attack. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
59f3b0218bf5501e050f35b6.tooltip:
Toggle Off: Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1*100 }}% Missing Health) Health.

Toggle On: Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and fills up 20% of the Blood Well.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f357c.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
59f3b0148bf5501e050f357c.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3561.name: Turtle Stance
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3561.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr gains Life Steal.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3561.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f3582.name: Riptide
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3582.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3582.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f357a.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
59f3b0148bf5501e050f357a.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f3581.name: Titan's Wrath
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3581.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3581.tooltip:
Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e3 }} seconds, shielding him from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of his max Health) damage.

While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to all enemies around his target.

59f3b0158bf5501e050f3585.name: Lay Waste
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3585.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
59f3b0158bf5501e050f3585.tooltip:
Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy.

If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.

59f3b0138bf5501e050f3560.name: Tiger Stance
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3560.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds, and his first basic attack will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks deal extra damage.
59f3b0138bf5501e050f3560.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, and Udyr will perform a Tiger Strike with his first basic attack, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3596.name: Stand United
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3596.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3596.tooltip: Shen grants a shield to a target allied champion that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, Shen and his spirit blade teleport to the ally's location.

59f3b0168bf5501e050f3595.name: Shadow Dash
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3595.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
59f3b0168bf5501e050f3595.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage with Shadow Dash or Twilight Assault recovers {{ f1 }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e2 }} [+{{ f2 }}] physical damage to enemy champions and neutral monsters in his path and taunting them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f3579.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
59f3b0148bf5501e050f3579.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

59f3b0148bf5501e050f357b.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
59f3b0148bf5501e050f357b.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3239.name: Ghost
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3239.description: Your champion can move through units for 10 seconds, gaining increased Movement Speed. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.

59f3b0388bf5501e050f380a.name: Cursed Touch
59f3b0388bf5501e050f380a.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 15% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.

59f3b0388bf5501e050f3809.name: Blood Well
59f3b0388bf5501e050f3809.description: Aatrox fills up his Blood Well through his abilities. When filled, Aatrox becomes Hellbent for as long as he stays in combat with champions, granting him attack damage, attack speed, and the ability to survive fatal damage.

59f3b0368bf5501e050f3801.name: Iceborn
59f3b0368bf5501e050f3801.description: Every 18 seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).
